title: How to Make Gluten Free Shortbread Chocolate Bars

steps.headline: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (180 degrees Celsius).
For the shortbread, measure the flour and baking powder into the bowl.
Add the butter and blend the butter into the flour mixture until it has the consistency of cornmeal.
steps.description: Do this with either a pastry blender or your hands.

steps.headline: Add the powdered sugar and the orange or lemon peel.
Press the mixture evenly into the bottom of an 8 inch (20.3 cm) square baking pan.
Remove from the oven and spread the chocolate chips evenly.
Wait for them to melt.
steps.description: You can put them in the stove for a minute or two if you get tired of waiting for them to melt.

steps.headline: Spread the melted chips so that they completely cover the shortbread.
For the topping, combine all of the rest of the ingredients into a bowl.
Pour the mixture over the chocolate layer.
Bake for about 25 minutes or until the top is lightly browned.
steps.description: Be sure to check for doneness. If it isn't completed done, put it back in the oven for a few minutes.

steps.headline: Cool them and lightly dust with powdered sugar.

text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees Fahrenheit (180 degrees Celsius).  For the shortbread, measure the flour and baking powder into the bowl.  Add the butter and blend the butter into the flour mixture until it has the consistency of cornmeal. Do this with either a pastry blender or your hands. Add the powdered sugar and the orange or lemon peel.  Press the mixture evenly into the bottom of an 8 inch (20.3 cm) square baking pan.  Pre-bake the crust for 7 minutes.  Remove from the oven and spread the chocolate chips evenly.  Wait for them to melt. You can put them in the stove for a minute or two if you get tired of waiting for them to melt. Spread the melted chips so that they completely cover the shortbread.  For the topping, combine all of the rest of the ingredients into a bowl. Mix thoroughly. Pour the mixture over the chocolate layer.  Bake for about 25 minutes or until the top is lightly browned. Be sure to check for doneness. If it isn't completed done, put it back in the oven for a few minutes. Cool them and lightly dust with powdered sugar. Cut into 20 even squares.
